模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.model

类 GoldCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ResourceCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GoldCard
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public class GoldCard extends ResourceCard implements Serializable
Represents a GoldCard in the game, which extends ResourceCard. A GoldCard has additional properties and methods to determine its requirements and points in the game.
另请参阅:

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard()
      Constructs a new GoldCard with default values.

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(int code, boolean isFront, Map<CornerPosition,Elements> corners)
      Constructs a new GoldCard with the specified code, orientation, and corner elements.
      参数:
      code - the unique code of the card
      isFront - the orientation of the card
      corners - the elements at the corners of the card

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(int code, boolean isFront, Map<CornerPosition,Elements> corners, Elements kingdom, int basePoint, int nReqElement, Elements secondElem, TypeBonus bonus)
      Constructs a new GoldCard with the specified properties.
      参数:
      code - the unique code of the card
      isFront - the orientation of the card
      corners - the elements at the corners of the card
      kingdom - the kingdom element associated with the card
      basePoint - the base points of the card
      nReqElement - the number of required elements for the card
      secondElem - the second element associated with the card
      bonus - the type of bonus associated with the card
